text: Cun ʙo kofiron ruʙaru suded, gardanasonro ʙizaned. Va cun onhoro saxt furu kufted, asirason kuned va saxt ʙiʙanded. On goh jo ʙa minnat ozod kumed jo ʙa fidja (ʙa ivazi pul). To on goh, ki cang ʙa pojon ojad. Va in ast hukmi Xudo. Va agar Xudo mexost, az onon intiqom megirift, vale xost to sumoro ʙa jakdigar ʙijozmojad. Va onon, ki dar rohi Xudo kusta sudaand, amalhojasonro ʙotil namekunad
